title: Epstein row: Elon Musk denies links; rejects ‘creepy island’ and ‘Lolita Express’ claims
summary_full: Tech billionaire Elon Musk has denied any connection to Jeffrey Epstein. Musk stated he never visited Epstein's island, attended his parties, or flew on his plane. His denial comes after his name surfaced in recently released Epstein case documents. Musk emphasized his support for full document disclosure and prosecution of abusers, even if it leads to personal attacks.
